message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe you'll find incredibly valuable.  Given its worth, I'm proposing a starting price of $13,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course.  What are your thoughts?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm looking to keep my investment within $15,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000?
Hi Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your budget considerations. While $10,000 is less than I hoped for, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $11,500?
